title: France panorama. [No. 71/50]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The France Australia Rugby Match - France wins 18 to 9. The Parc des Princes - Paris’ new stadium nearing completion. Helping the builders - mammoth exhibition of building materials. 2. Insects and men - study of insects at the Antibes agronomy laboratory. 3. Abel Gance - one of France’s major movie directors. 4. The arts: Balthus - sketches by Balthus. Naum Gabo - sculptures and dynamic structures.
